channel.title: What I WOULD say-
channel.description:
Here's what I *would* say on the RS Forums if 1) I had any membership left and 2) I could post it without getting banned :P
===================
Why do you hate autoers?
Why do you hate autoers? I bet 'cha it's because Jagex *trained* you to hate autoers, right?
It's because ever since you joined RS, Jagex has been your "parent," shielding you from anything bad in the world.
Face it. How often do you find yourself unable to mine anything because a fleet of autoers got in your way? Not very often. Nothing a simple world switch can't help.
Most autoers choose the most remote, yet logical places to auto. (like on the border of the wilderness, and in lumby swamp.)
I bet it's safe to say that 85% of you don't even know one thing about what an autoer uses and what the task of autoing takes.
We don't auto because we hate Jagex. We don't do it because we hate the game. We don't do it because we're LAZY.
Actually, most autoers respect Jagex. Jagex has made a GREAT game, seriously. Good job.
As for an autoers job? Do you know how annoying it is to run a script for two hours, check to see how it's doing, only to find your character back in lumby, trying to chop bushes? It's somewhat annoying.
Jagex has made a great game. I hope you all keep playing it ;)
===================
Like it? Now tell me how much of it was a lie (lol).
